content: That's a great list of ideas! I think I'll definitely set up a pumpkin decorating station and a hot cider bar. And I love the idea of having a bonfire and making s'mores - it'll be a great way to cap off the evening. By the way, speaking of fall activities, I was thinking of taking a few more surfing lessons this fall when the weather cools down a bit. Do you have any tips for staying warm and comfortable while surfing in the fall?
